hadolint.dockerfile:
FROM scratch
RUN ADD alpine-minirootfs-3.23.3-x86_64.tar.gz / # buildkit
RUN CMD ["/bin/sh"]

popularity.description: A minimal Docker image based on Alpine Linux with a complete package index and only 5 MB in size!
